Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Welcome \Wel"come\, v. t. [imp. & p. p. {Welcomed}; p. pr. & vb. n. {Welcoming}.] [AS. wilcumian.] To salute with kindness, as a newcomer; to receive and entertain hospitably and cheerfully; as, to welcome a visitor; to welcome a new idea. ``I welcome you to land.'' --Addison. [1913 Webster]
Thus we salute thee with our early song, And welcome thee, and wish thee long. --Milton. [1913 Webster]
welcoming adj : very cordial; "a welcoming smile"
